title: Landing Page for 2Baba 40-Year Concert
description: We’re looking for a skilled frontend designer to create a vibrant, high-converting landing page for 2Baba’s 20-year anniversary concert ticket sales. The page should capture the energy of the milestone event while making ticket purchase seamless and mobile-friendly. The design will serve as both a celebration of 2Baba’s legacy and a powerful tool for driving sales.

milestones.title: Wireframe & Visual Design
milestones.description: Develop page layout, color schemes, and branding concepts aligned with 2Baba’s anniversary theme.

milestones.title: Frontend Development
milestones.description: Build a fully responsive landing page with integrated ticketing functionality and smooth user flow.

milestones.title: Testing & Launch
milestones.description: Optimize for performance, test across devices, and deliver a polished page ready for live ticket sales.
